articles.description: Leeds United have fierce competition for playing time at right-back where Luke Ayling, Rasmus Kristensen and Cody Drameh all have strong claims to play
articles.content: Cardiff City Stadium has to be Cody Dramehs happy place in whats been a very short career so far. The Leeds United right-backs one and only run of senior football came with the Bluebirds and not only… [+2127 chars]

articles.author: James Nursey
articles.title: Wolves send unseen footage to Howard Webb after Liverpool VAR controversy - The Mirror
articles.description: Wolves were denied a late winner in their FA Cup third round clash with Liverpool at the weekend after a controversial VAR decision - made due to a lack of camera angles available
articles.content:
Wolves have written to referees chief Howard Webb to demand an explanation for the VAR controversy at Liverpool.
 Boss Julen Lopetegui is unhappy Wolves were denied victory in their 2-2 FA Cup draw … [+2179 chars]

articles.title: FA Cup: Cardiff City replay date & ticket information - Leeds United
articles.description: Details for third round replay.
articles.content:
The Emirates FA Cup third round replay between Leeds United and Cardiff City will take place at Elland Road on Wednesday 18th January 2023 (7:45pm).
The tie has been chosen for live broadcast on ITV… [+1969 chars]
